product_summary: Interviews by AI is a web-based platform that helps job seekers prepare for job interviews by providing them with realistic interview questions and instant AI feedback on their answers. The platform leverages GPT-3.5 technology to generate tailored questions and feedback based on the user's job description or sample roles. It offers both free and paid plans, with the paid plan providing unlimited questions and additional features.
product_pros: Generates realistic interview questions based on job description
Provides instant AI feedback on answers
Helps users practice answering interview questions in a simulated environment
Improves confidence and reduces stress before interviews
product_cons: AI feedback can sometimes be inaccurate or irrelevant
May not be suitable for all job roles or industries
Requires an internet connection to use
Free plan only allows for a limited number of questions per month
Does not provide personalized coaching or feedback from human experts

product_usecases.case: Preparing for a specific job interview
product_usecases.details: Interviews by AI can help you practice answering common interview questions tailored to the specific role you are applying for.
By practicing with a variety of interview questions, you can improve your overall interviewing skills and become more confident in your abilities.
The AI feedback can help you identify areas where you need to improve your answers, such as providing more specific examples or structuring your responses more effectively.
Practicing with Interviews by AI can help you build confidence and reduce stress before an actual interview.

product_usecases.case: Getting feedback on your interview performance
product_usecases.details: The AI feedback can provide valuable insights into your strengths and weaknesses, helping you improve your performance in future interviews.

product_toolfor.details: Interviews by AI is designed for job seekers who want to improve their interview skills and increase their chances of getting hired.
Career counselors can use Interviews by AI to help their clients prepare for job interviews and develop their career skills.
Recruiters can use Interviews by AI to screen candidates and identify those who are most qualified for a particular role.
Students can use Interviews by AI to practice for job interviews and prepare for their future careers.

product_toolfor.target: Anyone who wants to improve their interviewing skills
product_toolfor.details: Interviews by AI is a valuable tool for anyone who wants to improve their interviewing skills, regardless of their experience or career stage.
